name: get_user_related_profiles_by_user_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_looter.
Tool description: Access Instagram Data with Precision and Speed! Utilize Intelligent Request Filtering for Guaranteed 99.99% Response.
API description: Fetches related profiles for a given Instagram user ID using the RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: The Instagram user ID for which to fetch related profiles.
